titles.title: For the relief of Juan Gonzalez and Mayra Valenzuela.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/24/2001--Introduced. Declares Juan Gonzalez and Mayra Valenzuela to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
